name: Walking Tacos
author: Shawn Hoffman Zimmerman
summary: This has been a family favorite ever since our life got crazy chasing kids around. Quick and easy to make, kids love it, and there is no cleanup. The meat can be made up in advance, so when it's time to eat, just heat up the meat and you are ready to go. Easy enough to eat in the car on the way to soccer practice on a busy night!
ingredients: 6 (1.75 ounce) packages nacho cheese-flavored corn chips (such as Doritos®)
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 10 minutes
Crush chips without opening the bags
Open bags and spoon in seasoned beef
Cover with cheese, tomatoes, lettuce, and sour cream
Eat with forks right out of the bags
